Class StyleBuilder

Namespace
RTB.Blazor.Styled.Core
Assembly
RTB.Blazor.Styled.dll

A builder for CSS styles, supporting base declarations, nested selectors, groups (media/supports/container), and keyframes.

public sealed class StyleBuilder
